common_issues.title: Pieces OS performance issues and feature bugs
common_issues.description: Users are reporting various issues with Pieces OS, including slow performance with Long Term Memory, inability to cancel LLM downloads, and problems generating personal shareable links. Some users have reported that these issues have persisted for several months and across different Pieces OS versions. Troubleshooting steps have included disabling LTM for specific apps, switching to Cloud processing mode, and contacting support, but the issues often persist.

related_issues.title: Long Term Memory still slows down my PC, even after updating to LTM-2
related_issues.text:
Long Term Memory still slows down my PC, even after updating to LTM-2
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.0

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

Turning on Long Term Memory has been slowing down my desktop computer, even before LTM-2. After updating today, it still happens. It's most noticeable when I use Slack and Discord, and disabling those apps on LTM doesn't work. Even after switching the Processing Mode to Cloud, as suggested by HRA42 on the Discord server, the lag still occurs. At some point, the total CPU usage went up by over 90%.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/eaef0d65-b19b-41f0-bf8a-f143fa8d1e43)

My computer specs:
- CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-6300 CPU @ 3.80GHz
- RAM: DDR4 32 GB
- Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 2 GB

I'm yet to notice significant slowness on other programs, but if I'm getting a lot of lag on those chat apps, I can imagine I would get them too on something heavier like Visual Studio.

recommendations: "Investigate and address the root cause of Pieces OS performance issues, particularly with Long Term Memory, as this is a recurring and high-impact problem affecting user experience."
"Prioritize resolving the bug preventing users from generating personal shareable links, as it has persisted for over six months and significantly impacts collaboration features."
"Improve the LLM download cancellation process to provide users with more control and prevent potential frustration."
"Consider creating a dedicated troubleshooting guide or FAQ section for common Pieces OS issues, including steps to address slow performance and problems with specific features."
"Review and update the support ticket triage process to ensure timely responses and prevent issues from remaining unresolved for extended periods."
